SEARCH
Package seng201.team005.services

Class ShopService

java.lang.Object
seng201.team005.services.ShopService
public class ShopService extends Object
Service class for handling shop-related game logic

Handles the generation of random parts and cars for purchase, checks if the player can afford selected items in the cart , performs purchase action by deducting money out of the user balance and updates the player's inventory.

    • canAfford

      public boolean canAfford(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, List<Purchasable> items)
      A method which checks whether the player has enough money to afford selected items in the cart.
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - the game environment which contains the player's current balance
      items - the list of items to be purchased
      Returns:
      true if the player can afford the total cost of the items, false otherwise

    • purchaseItem

      public void purchaseItem(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, List<Purchasable> items)
      Processes purchase of items by deducting the total cost of the items from the player's balance. Adds purchased items to the appropriate inventory list.

      gameEnvironment -
      items -
